short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Welcome! View all tabs, search, compare side-by-side, consolidate windows, close duplicates, and manage tabs easily

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to Tab Manager Pro, the ultimate solution for managing your Chrome tabs with ease and efficiency. Designed to streamline your browsing experience, this extension offers a suite of powerful features that make handling multiple tabs a breeze. Whether you're a multitasker or just looking to keep your tabs organised, Tab Manager Pro is here to help.

Key Features:

List of All Tabs: View a comprehensive list of all your open tabs in one place. Easily navigate through your tabs without the hassle of searching through your browser window.

Search Tabs with Keywords: Quickly find the tab you need by searching with keywords, whether it's the tab name or URL. Save time and avoid frustration with this powerful search functionality.

Compare Tabs Side-by-Side: Need to compare information across two tabs? With a single click, you can open two tabs simultaneously on the left and right sides of your screen. Perfect for research, comparison shopping, and more.

Consolidate Scattered Windows: Have multiple windows open and want to bring all your tabs back into one? Tab Manager Pro allows you to reset all tabs from different windows into a single window, keeping your workspace tidy and organised.

Close Duplicate Tabs: Tired of duplicate tabs cluttering your browser? With one click, you can close all duplicate tabs, ensuring you only keep the ones you need.

Close Tabs Directly: Manage your tabs effortlessly by closing any tab directly from within the extension. No more switching back and forth between tabs to close them.

Why Choose Tab Manager Pro?

Tab Manager Pro is designed with user efficiency in mind. Its intuitive interface and powerful features make it an essential tool for anyone who wants to take control of their browsing experience. Whether you're a student, professional, or casual browser, you'll find this extension invaluable for managing your tabs effectively.

Get Started Today!

Download Tab Manager Pro now and transform the way you manage your Chrome tabs. Say goodbye to cluttered browsers and hello to a more organised, efficient, and productive browsing experience.
